troparion: (Tone 5) O Lord, Who has created the heart of each of us,* remember that we have come from dust;* do not condemn us to the depths of the earth.
prokimenon: My God, my God, why have You forsaken me? You are far from my plea and the cry of my distress.
second_prokimenon: You are there with Your crook * and Your staff;
with these You give me comfort.
The Lord is my shepherd; there is nothing I shall want.
